"--writeFormat=JSON",

"--influxMeasurement=bqio_10GB_results_java_stream",
"--sourceOptions={

\"keySizeBytes\":\"1\",
\"valueSizeBytes\":\"1024\"
}",
"--runner=DataflowRunner",
"--maxNumWorkers=5",
"--numWorkers=5",
"--autoscalingAlgorithm=NONE",
